languages.text: "Унылая забава. Хорош только тот суд, что заканчивается поединком правосудия — один на один, в кругу щитоносцев, под славную песнь!"
languages.translation_comment: Judged the RT's subjects at the Palace of Justice.

traits.locale_text: "Унылая забава. Хорош только тот суд, что заканчивается поединком правосудия — один на один, в кругу щитоносцев, под славную песнь!"

languages.text: "A depressing spectacle. The only trial worth holding is one that ends in single combat in a circle of shield-bearers, with a fine verse ringing in the air!"
languages.translation_comment: Judged the RT's subjects at the Palace of Justice.
languages.original_text: "Унылая забава. Хорош только тот суд, что заканчивается поединком правосудия — один на один, в кругу щитоносцев, под славную песнь!"

traits.locale_text: "A depressing spectacle. The only trial worth holding is one that ends in single combat in a circle of shield-bearers, with a fine verse ringing in the air!"
"A depressing spectacle. The only trial worth holding is one that ends in single combat in a circle of shield-bearers, with a fine verse ringing in the air!"

"A depressing spectacle. The only trial worth holding is one that ends in single combat in a circle of shield-bearers, with a fine verse ringing in the air!"

languages.text: 「なんとも陰気な見ものだ。本当に価値のある裁きってのは、盾持ちたちに囲まれた円陣の中で一騎討ちをして、空には詩の一節が響き渡る。そんなものだろう！」
languages.original_text: "A depressing spectacle. The only trial worth holding is one that ends in single combat in a circle of shield-bearers, with a fine verse ringing in the air!"

traits.locale_text: 「なんとも陰気な見ものだ。本当に価値のある裁きってのは、盾持ちたちに囲まれた円陣の中で一騎討ちをして、空には詩の一節が響き渡る。そんなものだろう！」

languages.text: "Ein deprimierendes Spektakel. Es gibt nur einen Prozess, der abzuhalten wert ist: Einen, der mit einem Duell in einem Kreis von Schildträgern endet, während ein prächtiger Vers durch die Lüfte hallt!"
languages.original_text: "A depressing spectacle. The only trial worth holding is one that ends in single combat in a circle of shield-bearers, with a fine verse ringing in the air!"

traits.locale_text: "Ein deprimierendes Spektakel. Es gibt nur einen Prozess, der abzuhalten wert ist: Einen, der mit einem Duell in einem Kreis von Schildträgern endet, während ein prächtiger Vers durch die Lüfte hallt!"

languages.text: « Un spectacle désolant. Un procès digne de ce nom devrait s'achever par un combat singulier contre un cercle de porte-boucliers, au son d'une bonne ballade ! »
languages.original_text: "A depressing spectacle. The only trial worth holding is one that ends in single combat in a circle of shield-bearers, with a fine verse ringing in the air!"

traits.locale_text: « Un spectacle désolant. Un procès digne de ce nom devrait s'achever par un combat singulier contre un cercle de porte-boucliers, au son d'une bonne ballade ! »

languages.text: «Ha sido un espectáculo deplorable. ¡El único juicio que merece la pena celebrar es el que se decide en duelo singular dentro de un círculo de escudos mientras se recitan versos épicos!».
languages.original_text: "A depressing spectacle. The only trial worth holding is one that ends in single combat in a circle of shield-bearers, with a fine verse ringing in the air!"

traits.locale_text: «Ha sido un espectáculo deplorable. ¡El único juicio que merece la pena celebrar es el que se decide en duelo singular dentro de un círculo de escudos mientras se recitan versos épicos!».

languages.text: “真是太沉闷了。审判的最后，应该让一群人拿着盾牌围成个圈，圆圈中间进行一对一决斗，周围飘扬着优美的诗句。只有这样的审判才值得举行！”
languages.original_text: "A depressing spectacle. The only trial worth holding is one that ends in single combat in a circle of shield-bearers, with a fine verse ringing in the air!"

traits.locale_text: “真是太沉闷了。审判的最后，应该让一群人拿着盾牌围成个圈，圆圈中间进行一对一决斗，周围飘扬着优美的诗句。只有这样的审判才值得举行！”

languages.text: "İç bunaltıcı bir temaşa. Ben asıl kalkanlı askerlerin esaslı bir mısra eşliğinde çarpışacağı bir muharebeye duruşma derim!"
languages.original_text: "A depressing spectacle. The only trial worth holding is one that ends in single combat in a circle of shield-bearers, with a fine verse ringing in the air!"

traits.locale_text: "İç bunaltıcı bir temaşa. Kalkanlı askerlerin esaslı bir mısra eşliğinde çarpışacağı bir muharebeye duruşma derim ben!"

languages.original_text: "A depressing spectacle. The only trial worth holding is one that ends in single combat in a circle of shield-bearers, with a fine verse ringing in the air!"
